# Neomorphism

UI components library in the new neomorphism design style

## Installation

```bash
# npm
npm install --save neomorphism

# yarn
yarn add neomorphism

# git
git clone https://github.com/ismail9k/neomorphism.git
cd neomorphism
npm install
```

## Documentation

https://ismail9k.com/neomorphism
